IDEA_AUTH.AGREEMENTS_CHECK_REGISTRATION: By creating my account, I accept
IDEA_AUTH.ALREADY_HAVE_A_RESET_CODE: I already have a reset code
IDEA_AUTH.ALREADY_HAVE_A_RESET_CODE_HINT: If you already have a reset code, go on and change your password
IDEA_AUTH.BACK_TO_SIGN_IN_HINT: Go back to the sign-in page
IDEA_AUTH.CHANGE_THE_PASSWORD_HINT: Note: the password should consist of {{ n }} characters or more
IDEA_AUTH.CONFIRM_NEW_PASSWORD_HINT: Confirm the chosen password and continue
IDEA_AUTH.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_ERROR: User not found, code not correct or password too short
IDEA_AUTH.CONFIRM_YOUR_EMAIL_TO_LOGIN: Before to log in, you have to confirm the email address you provided; check in your inbox or into the SPAM folder.
IDEA_AUTH.EMAIL_HINT: The email address you used to register
IDEA_AUTH.VALID_EMAIL_OBLIGATORY: A valid email address is obligatory
IDEA_AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_A_RESET_CODE: I haven't received the reset code yet
IDEA_AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_A_RESET_CODE_HINT: If you haven't received your reset code yet, repeat the procedure
IDEA_AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_CONFIRMATION_LINK: I haven't received the confirmation link
IDEA_AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_CONFIRMATION_LINK_HINT: If you haven't received the confirmation link yet, repeat the procedure
IDEA_AUTH.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Password changed! Now you can sign in again
IDEA_AUTH.PASSWORD_POLICY_VIOLATION: The password must be at least {{ n }} characters long
IDEA_AUTH.PASSWORD_RESET_CODE_SENT: The code to reset the password has been sent via email
IDEA_AUTH.PASSWORD_RESET_HINT: Type in your email to request a password reset
IDEA_AUTH.REGISTER_A_NEW_ACCOUNT_TO_THE_SYSTEM: Register a new account to the system
IDEA_AUTH.REGISTRATION_COMPLETED: Registration completed; confirm your email to log in
IDEA_AUTH.REGISTRATION_EMAIL_HINT: Choose an email address to use
IDEA_AUTH.RESEND_CONFIRMATION_LINK_HINT: Insert your username and we will send you another code at the email address you provided us; please check also your SPAM folder
IDEA_AUTH.RESEND_LINK_HINT: Resend the confirmation link to your email address
IDEA_AUTH.RESET_CODE_HINT: The code you received by email after the reset request
IDEA_AUTH.RESET_MY_PASSWORD_HINT: You will receive an email containing a code to reset your password
IDEA_AUTH.YOU_NEED_TO_CHOOSE_A_NEW_PASSWORD: Choose a new password for your account
IDEA_AUTH.ROBOT_USERS_CANT_SIGN_INTO_APPS_I: Robot users can't sign-into the app; they are created for back-end purposes.
IDEA_AUTH.ONLY_ONE_SIMULTANEOUS_SESSION_ALLOWED_I: Only one active session per account is allowed
IDEA_AUTH.ONLY_ONE_SIMULTANEOUS_SESSION_ALLOWED_II: There is already one active session for this account on another device; to proceed, you need to terminate the other session. You can terminate all the sessions with a global sign-out, but head's up: be sure to save any local data of the app on the other device first, since it will be deleted.
